name: .ZIF File Extension
summary: Learn about .ZIF files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Raster image file saved in the multi-resolution zooming image format used by Zoomorama software; designed to allow for effortless manipulation of HD images.

content: NOTE: ZIF images could be created with ZoomCreator and viewed at the Zoomorama website up until 2010 when it was discontinued.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
